ClericSpells.Name: Bane
ClericSpells.Description: Up to three creatures of your choice that you can see within range must make Charisma saving throws.

ClericSpells.Name: Bless
ClericSpells.Description: You bless up to three creatures of your choice within range.

ClericSpells.Name: Command
ClericSpells.Description: You speak a one-word command to a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or follow the command on its next turn.

ClericSpells.Name: Create or Destroy Water
ClericSpells.Description: You either create or destroy water. You can create up to 10 gallons of clean water within range in an open container.

ClericSpells.Name: Cure Wounds
ClericSpells.Description: A creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

ClericSpells.Name: Detect Evil and Good
ClericSpells.Description: For the duration, you know if there is an aberration, celestial, elemental, fey, fiend, or undead within 30 feet of you.

ClericSpells.Name: Detect Magic
ClericSpells.Description: For the duration, you sense the presence of magic within 30 feet of you.

ClericSpells.Name: Detect Poison and Disease
ClericSpells.Description: For the duration, you can sense the presence and location of poisons, poisonous creatures, and diseases within 30 feet of you.

ClericSpells.Name: Guiding Bolt
ClericSpells.Description: A flash of light streaks toward a creature of your choice within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target.

ClericSpells.Name: Healing Word
ClericSpells.Description: A creature of your choice that you can see within range regains hit points equal to 1d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

ClericSpells.Name: Inflict Wounds
ClericSpells.Description: Make a melee spell attack against a creature you can reach.

ClericSpells.Name: Protection from Evil and Good
ClericSpells.Description: Until the spell ends, one willing creature you touch is protected against certain types of creatures.

ClericSpells.Name: Purify Food and Drink
ClericSpells.Description: All nonmagical food and drink within a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on a point of your choice within range is purified and rendered free of poison and disease.

ClericSpells.Name: Sanctuary
ClericSpells.Description: You ward a creature within range against attack. Until the spell ends, any creature who targets the warded creature with an attack or harmful spell must first make a Wisdom saving throw.

ClericSpells.Name: Shield of Faith
ClericSpells.Description: A shimmering field appears and surrounds a creature of your choice within range, granting it a +2 bonus to AC for the duration.

ClericSpells.Name: Aid
ClericSpells.Description: Your spell bolsters your allies with toughness and resolve. Choose up to three creatures within range.

ClericSpells.Name: Augury
ClericSpells.Description: By casting gem-inlaid sticks, rolling dragon bones, laying out ornate cards, or employing some other divining tool, you receive an omen from an otherworldly entity.

ClericSpells.Name: Blindness/Deafness
ClericSpells.Description: You can blind or deafen a foe.

ClericSpells.Name: Calm Emotions
ClericSpells.Description: You attempt to suppress strong emotions in a group of people.

ClericSpells.Name: Continual Flame
ClericSpells.Description: A flame, equivalent in brightness to a torch, springs forth from an object that you touch.

ClericSpells.Name: Enhance Ability
ClericSpells.Description: You touch a creature and bestow upon it a magical enhancement.

ClericSpells.Name: Find Traps
ClericSpells.Description: You sense the presence of any trap within range that is within line of sight.

ClericSpells.Name: Gentle Repose
ClericSpells.Description: You touch a corpse or other remains.

ClericSpells.Name: Hold Person
ClericSpells.Description: The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for the duration.

ClericSpells.Name: Lesser Restoration
ClericSpells.Description: You touch a creature and can end either one disease or one condition afflicting it.

ClericSpells.Name: Locate Object
ClericSpells.Description: You sense the direction to the object's location, as long as that object is within 1,000 feet of you.

ClericSpells.Name: Prayer of Healing
ClericSpells.Description: Up to six creatures of your choice that you can see within range each regain hit points equal to 2d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

ClericSpells.Name: Protection from Poison
ClericSpells.Description: You touch a creature. If it is poisoned, you neutralize the poison.

ClericSpells.Name: Silence
ClericSpells.Description: For the duration, no sound can be created within or pass through a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point you choose within range.

ClericSpells.Name: Spiritual Weapon
ClericSpells.Description: You create a floating, spectral weapon within range that lasts for the duration or until you cast this spell again.

ClericSpells.Name: Warding Bond
ClericSpells.Description: This spell wards a willing creature you touch and creates a mystic connection between you and the target.

ClericSpells.Name: Zone of Truth
ClericSpells.Description: You create a magical zone that guards against deception.

ClericSpells.Name: Animate Dead
ClericSpells.Description: This spell creates an undead servant to obey your spoken commands.

ClericSpells.Name: Beacon of Hope
ClericSpells.Description: This spell bestows hope and vitality. Choose any number of creatures within range.

ClericSpells.Name: Bestow Curse
ClericSpells.Description: You touch a creature, and that creature must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or become cursed for the duration.

ClericSpells.Name: Clairvoyance
ClericSpells.Description: You create an invisible sensor within range in a location familiar to you (a place you have visited or seen before) or in an obvious location that is unfamiliar to you.

ClericSpells.Name: Create Food and Water
ClericSpells.Description: You create 45 pounds of food and 30 gallons of water on the ground or in containers within range.

ClericSpells.Name: Daylight
ClericSpells.Description: A 60-foot-radius sphere of light spreads out from a point you choose within range.

ClericSpells.Name: Dispel Magic
ClericSpells.Description: Choose one creature, object, or magical effect within range. Any spell of 3rd level or lower on the target ends.

ClericSpells.Name: Glyph of Warding
ClericSpells.Description: When you cast this spell, you inscribe a glyph that harms other creatures, either upon a surface (such as a table or a section of floor or wall) or within an object that can be closed (such as a book, a scroll, or a treasure chest).

ClericSpells.Name: Magic Circle
ClericSpells.Description: You create a 10-foot-radius, 20-foot-tall cylinder of magical energy centered on a point on the ground that you can see within range.

ClericSpells.Name: Mass Healing Word
ClericSpells.Description: As you call out words of restoration, up to six creatures of your choice that you can see within range regain hit points.

ClericSpells.Name: Meld into Stone
ClericSpells.Description: You step into a stone object or surface large enough to fully contain your body, melding yourself and all the equipment you carry with the stone for the duration.

ClericSpells.Name: Protection from Energy
ClericSpells.Description: For the duration, the willing creature you touch has resistance to one damage type of your choice.

ClericSpells.Name: Remove Curse
ClericSpells.Description: At your touch, all curses affecting one creature or object end.

ClericSpells.Name: Revivify
ClericSpells.Description: You touch a creature that has died within the last minute.

ClericSpells.Name: Sending
ClericSpells.Description: You send a short message of twenty-five words or less to a creature with which you are familiar.

ClericSpells.Name: Speak with Dead
ClericSpells.Description: You grant the semblance of life and intelligence to a corpse of your choice within range, allowing it to answer the questions you pose.

ClericSpells.Name: Spirit Guardians
ClericSpells.Description: You call forth spirits to protect you.

ClericSpells.Name: Tongues
ClericSpells.Description: This spell grants the creature you touch the ability to understand any spoken language it hears.

ClericSpells.Name: Water Walk
ClericSpells.Description: This spell grants the ability to move across any liquid surface—such as water, acid, mud, snow, quicksand, or lava—as if it were harmless solid ground.

ClericSpells.Name: Banishment
ClericSpells.Description: You attempt to send one creature that you can see within range to another plane of existence.

ClericSpells.Name: Control Water
ClericSpells.Description: Until the spell ends, you control any freestanding water inside an area you choose that is a cube up to 100 feet on a side.

ClericSpells.Name: Death Ward
ClericSpells.Description: You touch a creature and grant it a measure of protection from death.

ClericSpells.Name: Divination
ClericSpells.Description: Your magic and an offering put you in contact with a god or a god’s servants.

ClericSpells.Name: Freedom of Movement
ClericSpells.Description: For the duration, the target's movement is unaffected by difficult terrain, and spells and other magical effects can neither reduce the target’s speed nor cause the target to be paralyzed or restrained.

ClericSpells.Name: Guardian of Faith
ClericSpells.Description: A Large spectral guardian appears and hovers for the duration in an unoccupied space of your choice that you can see within range.

ClericSpells.Name: Locate Creature
ClericSpells.Description: Describe or name a creature that is familiar to you. You sense the direction to the creature’s location, as long as that creature is within 1,000 feet of you.

ClericSpells.Name: Stone Shape
ClericSpells.Description: You touch a stone object of Medium size or smaller or a section of stone no more than 5 feet in any dimension and form it into any shape that suits your purpose.

ClericSpells.Name: Commune
ClericSpells.Description: You contact your deity or a divine proxy and ask up to three questions that can be answered with a yes or no.

ClericSpells.Name: Contagion
ClericSpells.Description: Your touch inflicts disease. Make a melee spell attack against a creature you can reach.

ClericSpells.Name: Dispel Evil and Good
ClericSpells.Description: Shimmering energy surrounds and protects you from fey, undead, and creatures originating from beyond the Material Plane.

ClericSpells.Name: Flame Strike
ClericSpells.Description: A vertical column of divine fire roars down from the heavens in a location you specify.

ClericSpells.Name: Geas
ClericSpells.Description: You place a magical command on a creature that you can see within range, forcing it to carry out some service or refrain from some action or course of activity as you decide.

ClericSpells.Name: Greater Restoration
ClericSpells.Description: You imbue a creature you touch with positive energy to undo a debilitating effect.

ClericSpells.Name: Hallow
ClericSpells.Description: You touch a point and infuse an area around it with holy (or unholy) power.

ClericSpells.Name: Insect Plague
ClericSpells.Description: Swarming, biting locusts fill a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point you choose within range.

ClericSpells.Name: Legend Lore
ClericSpells.Description: Name or describe a person, place, or object. The spell brings to your mind a brief summary of the significant lore about the thing you named.

ClericSpells.Name: Mass Cure Wounds
ClericSpells.Description: A wave of healing energy washes out from a point of your choice within range.

ClericSpells.Name: Planar Binding
ClericSpells.Description: With this spell, you attempt to bind a celestial, an elemental, a fey, or a fiend to your service.

ClericSpells.Name: Raise Dead
ClericSpells.Description: You return a dead creature you touch to life, provided that it has been dead no longer than 10 days.

ClericSpells.Name: Scrying
ClericSpells.Description: You can see and hear a particular creature you choose that is on the same plane of existence as you.

ClericSpells.Name: Blade Barrier
ClericSpells.Description: You create a vertical wall of whirling, razor-sharp blades made of magical energy.

ClericSpells.Name: Create Undead
ClericSpells.Description: You can cast this spell only at night. Choose up to three corpses of Medium or Small humanoids within range.

ClericSpells.Name: Find the Path
ClericSpells.Description: This spell allows you to find the shortest, most direct physical route to a specific fixed location that you are familiar with on the same plane of existence.

ClericSpells.Name: Forbiddance
ClericSpells.Description: You create a ward against magical travel that protects up to 40,000 square feet of floor space to a height of 30 feet above the floor.

ClericSpells.Name: Harm
ClericSpells.Description: You unleash a virulent disease on a creature that you can see within range.

ClericSpells.Name: Heal
ClericSpells.Description: A surge of positive energy washes through the creature, causing it to regain 70 hit points.

ClericSpells.Name: Heroes' Feast
ClericSpells.Description: You bring forth a great feast, including magnificent food and drink.

ClericSpells.Name: Planar Ally
ClericSpells.Description: You beseech an otherworldly entity for aid. The being must be known to you: a god, a primordial, a demon prince, or some other being of cosmic power.

ClericSpells.Name: True Seeing
ClericSpells.Description: This spell gives the willing creature you touch the ability to see things as they actually are.

ClericSpells.Name: Word of Recall
ClericSpells.Description: You and up to five willing creatures within 5 feet of you instantly teleport to a previously designated sanctuary.

ClericSpells.Name: Conjure Celestial
ClericSpells.Description: You summon a celestial of challenge rating 4 or lower, which appears in an unoccupied space that you can see within range.

ClericSpells.Name: Divine Word
ClericSpells.Description: You speak a word of God, filled with the power of the divine.

ClericSpells.Name: Etherealness
ClericSpells.Description: You step into the border regions of the Ethereal Plane, in the area where it overlaps with your current plane.

ClericSpells.Name: Fire Storm
ClericSpells.Description: A storm made up of sheets of roaring flame appears in a location you choose within range.

ClericSpells.Name: Plane Shift
ClericSpells.Description: You and up to eight willing creatures who link hands in a circle are transported to a different plane of existence.

ClericSpells.Name: Regenerate
ClericSpells.Description: You touch a creature and stimulate its natural healing ability.

ClericSpells.Name: Resurrection
ClericSpells.Description: You touch a dead creature that has been dead for no more than a century, that didn’t die of old age, and that isn’t undead.

ClericSpells.Name: Symbol
ClericSpells.Description: When you cast this spell, you inscribe a harmful glyph either on a surface (such as a section of floor, a wall, or a table) or within an object.

ClericSpells.Name: Antimagic Field
ClericSpells.Description: A 10-foot-radius invisible sphere of antimagic surrounds you. This area is divorced from the magical energy that suffuses the multiverse.

ClericSpells.Name: Control Weather
ClericSpells.Description: You take control of the weather within 5 miles of you for the duration. You must be outdoors to cast this spell.

ClericSpells.Name: Earthquake
ClericSpells.Description: You create a seismic disturbance at a point on the ground that you can see within range.

ClericSpells.Name: Holy Aura
ClericSpells.Description: Divine light washes out from you and coalesces in a soft radiance in a 30-foot radius around you.

ClericSpells.Name: Astral Projection
ClericSpells.Description: You and up to eight willing creatures within range project your astral bodies into the Astral Plane (the spell fails and the casting is wasted if you are already on that plane).

ClericSpells.Name: Gate
ClericSpells.Description: You conjure a portal linking an unoccupied space you can see within range to a precise location on a different plane of existence.

ClericSpells.Name: Mass Heal
ClericSpells.Description: A flood of healing energy flows from you into injured creatures around you. You restore up to 700 hit points, divided as you choose among any number of creatures that you can see within range.

ClericSpells.Name: True Resurrection
ClericSpells.Description: You touch a creature that has been dead for no longer than 200 years and that died for any reason except old age.
